section.p: The variables in the following table are set only on the master host. The first group of variables is set during installation, and the defaults of the second group may need to be changed before starting the master host for the first time. Typically, the last two groups of variables are not changed until has managed your application for a while and you see a need to do so.

row.entry: The driver type, device path, and base size of the application data storage resource.
Provide basic information about the data storage resource.
The data storage paths of separate functional components of internal services.
Enable separate storage areas for one or more components. The default installation process puts all three components on the same device.
The snapshot retention interval and the percentage of the data storage thin pool that is unused.
Prevent the creation of snapshots that are too large to fit the thin pool.
The variables that manage the amount of space used by the application log storage service.
Prevent application logs from filling the storage device that the log storage service uses.
